title: Display S, Preample M
code:
<gds-flex max-width="700px" padding="5xl" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" gap="m">
  <gds-text text-align="center " font="display-s">Climate change is the greatest and most urgent challenge of our
    generation.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-text max-width="600px" padding="0 2xl 0 2xl" "color=" content-02" text-align="center " font="preamble-m">We have
    committed to the Paris Agreement by the signing of the UNEP FI Principles for Responsible Banking, and one of the
    founding signatories of the Net-Zero Banking Alliance and the Net Zero Asset Managers initiative.
  </gds-text>
    <gds-badge variant="notice">M (16)</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>
